additionalnotes.value: ALL, ANLL. Recommend 50%25 dose reduction in patients with serum creatinine greater than 200 umol/L. In patients with serum Bilirubin 40 to 85 umol/L, suggest 50%25 dose reduction. If serum bilirubin level is greater than 85 umol/L; suggest omit dose.

ALL. Recommend 50%25 dose reduction in patients with serum creatinine greater than 200 umol/L. In patients with serum Bilirubin 40 to 85 umol/L, suggest 50%25 dose reduction. If serum bilirubin level is greater than 85 umol/L; suggest omit dose.
